Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 83rd overall pick, by Detroit in 2009...
Injured on 4/18/2010 with a Fractured Finger, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2017, off Jon Lester (LAA)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/11/2017, off Trevor Cahill (BOS)...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
Injured on 8/7/2018 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Detroit to Cincinnati on 4/12/2019 (Going to CIN: P W. Chen, P S. Teeters, LF A. Sanchez. Going to DET: P B. Wright, LF R. Deschamps)...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2021...
Injured on 5/3/2022 with a Bruised Ulna, out for 1-2 weeks...
